title: Missing bugsplat.dll
body: I am getting an error while loading the Client Patcher saying I am missing bugsplat.dll. Does anyone know a remedy for this or am I going to have to spend the next 2 years re-downloading this game?

replies.body: I cant get into league of ledgands and the game is the best game ive ever played <3
I am getting an error while loading the Client Patcher saying I am missing bugsplat.dll. Does anyone know a remedy for this or am i going to have to spend the next 2 years re-downloading this game?
i can't open league of legends

This error usually pops up if there are missing components in your League installation. You can most likely resolve this by grabbing our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and running the '**Force Repatch**' function. 

If you still have issues after forcing a repatch, please let me know.

Forcing repatch
Finding latest patch... Done
Patch Path:
Removing latest patch... Failed
Error: The syntax of the command is incorrect.
why not copy LOL files from your friend?
